name: Making Tea At The End Of The Universe
name_original: Making Tea At The End Of The Universe
description:
When everything ends, where do immortals go?
...that's a heavy question, so let's just have tea.

━━━━━━━━━━▼━━━━━━━━━━

Meet a cast of quirky characters and find 6 endings and 3 mini-routes in this little bitsy game, made for the June bitsy jam with the theme "heat death of the universe".

Content warnings: cursing, mentions of suicidal ideation, and allusions to death (and other similar "end of the universe" types of topics)

━━━━━━━━━━▼━━━━━━━━━━

Credits:

  • Hacks by Borksy
  • Image conversion by Pixsy
  • Tiles adapted from works by Victoria Lacroix, Teaceratops and Reesma

No music for now, though I may add some later! I had trouble getting bitsymuse to work for bitsy 8.0.
